description.paragraph1: A boat excursion website created with WordPress, using the Phlox theme and the Elementor builder. A site that combines creativity and functionality, designed to enhance the tourist experience.

phase1.heading: Preliminary Study:
phase1.description: I conducted in-depth research on templates for boat excursion websites, analyzing visual styles and techniques for using Elementor.

tasks.task: Creating the page hierarchy and developing it in WordPress.
Creating background designs with Figma, to add a personalized touch.
Optimizing the SEO system to increase visibility.

subPhases.description: Color Palette: I chose a color combination reflecting the sea colors: #256D85 (Teal Blue), #3B82F6 (Blue Cornflower), and #FDFDFD (White Smoke).
Images: All visual elements were hand-drawn with Figma.

resultsAndConclusions.heading: Results and Conclusions
points: A boat excursion website with an attractive design.
An engaging visual experience thanks to the use of vibrant colors and personalized content.
An expanded SEO structure to improve visibility on search engines.
